demotivational_quotes.quote: The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking spaces.
demotivational_quotes.author: Will Rogers

demotivational_quotes.quote: Sometimes the light at the end of the tunnel is a train.
demotivational_quotes.author: Charles Barkley

demotivational_quotes.quote: The grass is always greener on the other side. Because it's fertilized with bullshit.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If at first you don't succeed, skydiving is not for you.
demotivational_quotes.author: Steven Wright

demotivational_quotes.quote: Aim low. Reach your goals. Avoid disappointment.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The best things in life are actually really expensive.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Just because you’re unique doesn’t mean you’re useful.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take, and statistically speaking, 99% of the ones you do.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The only reason some people get lost in thought is because it’s unfamiliar territory.
demotivational_quotes.author: Paul Fix

demotivational_quotes.quote: Success is going from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm—until you do.
demotivational_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

demotivational_quotes.quote: Hard work never killed anybody, but why take a chance?
demotivational_quotes.author: Edgar Bergen

demotivational_quotes.quote: Sometimes you’re the windshield; sometimes you’re the bug.
demotivational_quotes.author: Mark Knopfler

demotivational_quotes.quote: It could be that the purpose of your life is only to serve as a warning to others.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If you can’t beat them, arrange to have them beaten.
demotivational_quotes.author: George Carlin

demotivational_quotes.quote: Teamwork makes the dream work. But a vision without a team is a nightmare.
demotivational_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

demotivational_quotes.quote: Rome wasn’t built in a day, but it sure could’ve been finished quicker with better planning.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: It’s not that I’m lazy. I’m just on energy-saving mode.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If at first you don’t succeed, redefine success.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The only time success comes before work is in the dictionary.
demotivational_quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

demotivational_quotes.quote: Dream small. It's more achievable.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The sooner you fall behind, the more time you’ll have to catch up.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Every time you find the meaning of life, they change it.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Trying is the first step toward failure.
demotivational_quotes.author: Homer Simpson

demotivational_quotes.quote: You’re never too old to give up on your dreams.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The elevator to success is out of order. You’ll have to use the stairs… one step at a time.
demotivational_quotes.author: Joe Girard

demotivational_quotes.quote: It’s always darkest before it goes pitch black.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Some people dream of success… while others wake up and work hard at failure.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Remember, today is the tomorrow you worried about yesterday.
demotivational_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

demotivational_quotes.quote: You can’t have everything. Where would you put it?
demotivational_quotes.author: Steven Wright

demotivational_quotes.quote: The road to nowhere is paved with bad intentions.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If you think nobody cares if you’re alive, try missing a couple of payments.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
demotivational_quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

demotivational_quotes.quote: You can’t make everyone happy. You’re not pizza.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The light at the end of the tunnel may be an oncoming train.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: There are no winners in the game of life, only survivors.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: You can’t change the direction of the wind, but you can adjust your sails to always reach your destination—if you can figure out where you’re going.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: You’re only as good as your last failure.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: When nothing goes right, go left.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If you want to avoid criticism, say nothing, do nothing, and be nothing.
demotivational_quotes.author: Aristotle

demotivational_quotes.quote: Even a stopped clock is right twice a day.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The problem with doing nothing is that you never know when you’re finished.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: You can’t please everyone. You’re not pizza.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Dream big, and then settle for less.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going—unless you’re lost, then stop and ask for directions.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Life is short. Smile while you still have teeth.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Apathy is the best response to most things.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If you think things can’t get worse, they probably can.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If you always do what you’ve always done, you’ll always get what you’ve always gotten.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Success is like being pregnant: Everybody says congratulations, but nobody knows how many times you were screwed.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The best way to appreciate your job is to imagine yourself without one.
demotivational_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

demotivational_quotes.quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get—said no one ever.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: You’re not behind. You’re just taking a longer route.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The road to success is always under construction.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Some people bring happiness wherever they go. Others, whenever they go.
demotivational_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

demotivational_quotes.quote: It’s not whether you win or lose, it’s how you place the blame.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The best way to get things done is to simply not do them.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: You can’t change the past, but you can ruin the present by worrying about the future.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Success is a journey, not a destination—unless you’re lost.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: No matter how bad things get, you’ll never be alone—someone will always make things worse.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If you think you’re too small to make a difference, try sleeping in a room with a mosquito.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The more things change, the more they stay the same—just with a different set of problems.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If you can’t dazzle them with brilliance, baffle them with bullshit.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: There’s no place like home—unless you’ve ever been to a tropical island.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons, make lemonade. Then find someone whose life has given them vodka and have a party.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: To be old and wise, you must first be young and stupid.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The future is bright—until it’s not.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Life is like a box of chocolates. It’s a complete mess and you’ll probably end up with the weird ones.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Never put off until tomorrow what you can avoid doing altogether.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The most successful people are those who are willing to fail the most.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Procrastination is the art of keeping up with yesterday.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Nothing is impossible for the person who doesn’t have to do it.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: When you don’t know what you’re doing, do it quickly.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Success is just a matter of luck—ask any failure.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If you’re not failing, you’re not trying hard enough—or you’re doing something very wrong.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The secret to success is to know when to quit.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great—unless you’re not going to start.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: You can’t control the wind, but you can adjust your sails—and then hope you don’t run aground.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Life is a series of setbacks and triumphs, but mostly setbacks.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If you don’t know where you’re going, any road will take you there—eventually.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The only thing harder than learning from mistakes is pretending you didn’t make any.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: There’s no ‘I’ in team, but there is a ‘me’ if you rearrange the letters.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: You can’t always get what you want, but you might get what you need—eventually.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Success is a journey, not a destination—especially if you’re lost.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: You can’t make an omelette without breaking a few eggs—unless you’re a vegetarian.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Every day is a new opportunity to fail.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on—or just let go.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: You don’t have to be crazy to work here, but it helps.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The best way to achieve your goals is to set them low.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Success is just a series of failures with a few breaks in between.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If you don’t succeed, try again—or just give up.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The road to success is always under construction—especially if you’re on it.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The only thing that’s guaranteed is that nothing is guaranteed.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: When you aim for perfection, you often hit mediocrity.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The more things change, the more they stay the same—just with more complexity.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: When all else fails, lower your standards.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The only way to avoid mistakes is to do nothing.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: You can’t control everything, but you can control how you react to it—or just avoid it.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Success is a journey of a thousand missteps.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: You can’t change the past, but you can ruin the present by worrying about the future.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If you don’t make mistakes, you’re not trying hard enough—or you’re not doing anything.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The only way to avoid criticism is to do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The only thing worse than failing is succeeding and then having to do it again.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The early bird may get the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: You can’t win them all—especially if you don’t play.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If you keep on doing what you’ve always done, you’ll keep on getting what you’ve always gotten.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Success is a series of failures with a few lucky breaks.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The harder you try, the more you fail.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If you don’t know where you’re going, you might end up somewhere else.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step—and then a lot of backtracking.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If at first you don’t succeed, redefine success.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: You can’t succeed if you don’t try—unless you’re lucky.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The only way to make a difference is to make sure you don’t.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If you’re not part of the solution, you’re part of the problem—unless you’re not involved.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Success is a series of failures that you’re too stubborn to quit.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: You can’t always get what you want, but if you try sometimes, you might find you get what you need—if you’re lucky.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The only way to achieve greatness is to do nothing.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: Success is a series of failures punctuated by occasional victories.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If you want to avoid criticism, don’t do anything, don’t say anything, and don’t be anything.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The only thing worse than failure is success followed by failure.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The journey to success is littered with failures and disappointments.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: You can’t please everyone—especially if you’re not trying.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: If you don’t know where you’re going, any road will take you there—eventually.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The only way to guarantee success is to not try.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: You can’t have everything—where would you put it anyway?
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown

demotivational_quotes.quote: The only way to avoid failure is to avoid trying.
demotivational_quotes.author: Unknown
